name: Feed the Flames (Eggsquisite)
description:
Feed the Flames is a short puzzle platformer where the player must use their ability to rewind time in order to pass obstacles and solve puzzles. Torches are scattered throughout the levels where the player must light each torch before lighting the final bonfire. However upon doing so, the level rewinds itself and the player must act fast to get back to the start of the level!

Thanks for Brackey's for hosting this jam! 

Devs:

EliTheWolf

Eggsquisite
